meta.title: Arnaud Martiny | Full-Stack Web Developer – Portfolio & Custom Development
meta.description: Passionate Full-Stack Developer based in Brussels. I turn your ideas into modern web applications, from UX/UI design in Figma to full development. Explore my projects and let's talk!

about.title: ABOUT ME
about.paragraph1: For me, a website is much more than a showcase. It's the digital meeting point between an idea and its audience. My passion is to build this connection: to design web experiences that are not only beautiful but also logical, efficient, and intuitive.
about.paragraph2: My Full-Stack approach allows me to manage this vision from A to Z. On the Back-End, I architect robust server logic and databases (PHP, MySQL) that form the application's backbone. On the Front-End, I sculpt every interaction to create a fluid and engaging user experience (UX/UI), where technology becomes invisible.
about.paragraph3: This dual expertise is my greatest strength: it ensures total consistency between technology and design. Eager for challenges and meticulous, I approach every project—whether creating a custom platform or optimizing a Shopify store—with the same commitment: to deliver a reliable, effective digital product that you will be proud of.

items.title: Arnaud Martiny - Portfolio
items.description: The challenge: to demonstrate my mastery of core web technologies without relying on frameworks. My solution: I designed and developed this platform from scratch using pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, integrating complex animations with GSAP and a custom translation system. This project showcases my ability to architect a robust and optimized front-end application.

caseStudy.title: C:\Projects\Portfolio_Meta.exe
caseStudy.brief: How to create a portfolio that is more than a resume, but a true demonstration of skills? The goal was to build an immersive experience coded in 'vanilla' (without major frameworks) to prove a fundamental mastery of web technologies, interaction design, and performance optimization.
caseStudy.role: As the sole developer, I orchestrated everything: UX/UI design in Figma, front-end development in HTML/CSS/JS, and integration of complex animations with GSAP. The 'mobile-first' approach ensured perfect responsiveness, and I implemented a custom-built internationalization (i18n) system for global reach.
caseStudy.results: The result is a high-performance, interactive website that is fully manageable via JSON files. This project allowed me to solidify my skills in front-end architecture, DOM optimization, and creating a memorable user experience from scratch.

items.title: Nowa Logistics
items.imageAlt: Preview of the Nowa Logistics project
items.description: The challenge: to create the digital identity for Nowa Market's new logistics entity. My solution: during my internship, I took full ownership of this project, from the UX/UI mockups in Figma to the complete front-end development. This experience proved my ability to manage a project autonomously in a professional setting and deliver a finished product that meets a concrete business need.

caseStudy.title: C:\Projects\Nowa_Logistics_Showcase.exe
caseStudy.brief: The new entity 'Nowa Logistics' needed a professional showcase website to establish its credibility, present its sustainable logistics services, and generate qualified business leads. The challenge was to translate a business vision into an effective and modern digital tool.
caseStudy.role: I led this project from conception to delivery. After defining the site structure and user journey, I created mockups and prototypes in Figma. I then developed the site using pure HTML/CSS/JS for optimal performance and integrated a functional PHP contact form.
caseStudy.results: The project resulted in a showcase site ready for launch, perfectly meeting the client's needs. This internship experience was crucial for learning how to manage a project in real-world conditions, collaborate with teams, and transform a business request into a finished product.

items.description: The challenge: replace an aging, hacked site for a non-profit on a budget. My solution: A complete overhaul focusing on security, modern design, and ease of management. Website officially launched!

caseStudy.results: The site is live! It provides a professional, secure, and mobile-friendly showcase.

items.title: Fast 'N Friends
items.imageAlt: Preview of the Fast N Friends project
items.description: The challenge: as part of a two-person team, build a fully functional carpooling platform from the ground up. My role was central to the back-end: I designed the MySQL database and developed the core logic in PHP, handling user management, sessions, and ride postings. This project was key to strengthening my back-end development skills and my experience with team collaboration using Git.

caseStudy.title: C:\Projects\FastNFriends_Platform.exe
caseStudy.brief: As part of this fictional academic project, the challenge was to build a 100% functional carpooling platform as a two-person team. The specifications required complete user management, an ad posting system, and a search engine, all based on a relational database.
caseStudy.role: My primary role focused on the database architecture (MySQL) and developing a large part of the back-end logic in PHP. I programmed the critical modules: profiles, sessions, trip posting, and search. I also contributed to the development of the custom WordPress theme to integrate these features.
caseStudy.results: This project was a technical and collaborative success. It allowed me to practice advanced PHP/SQL skills, understand the challenges of collaboration via Git, and grasp the complexity of creating a dynamic web application from end to end.

privacyModal.title: Privacy Policy
privacyModal.intro: Respecting your privacy is important to me. This privacy policy explains what data is collected when you interact with this website (arnaud-martiny.be) and how it is used.
privacyModal.contactFormTitle: 1. Data Collected via the Contact Form
privacyModal.contactFormIntro: When you use the contact form, the following information is collected and stored in a secure file on the server, and is also sent to me by email:
contactFormPoints: The subject and content of your message
privacyModal.contactFormPurpose: Purpose: This data is collected solely for the purpose of responding to your request and ensuring follow-up on our communications.
privacyModal.aiAssistantTitle: 2. Data Collected via the AI Assistant (Terminal)
privacyModal.aiAssistantIntro: When you interact with the AI assistant available on this site, the following data is recorded for each message you send:
aiAssistantPoints: The response provided by the AI
Your IP address (to manage usage limits)
privacyModal.aiAssistantPurpose: Purpose: This data is collected for analytical purposes to improve the quality and relevance of the AI's responses, as well as to prevent abuse of the service (rate limiting).
privacyModal.landingPageIntro: As part of specific communication campaigns (e.g., LinkedIn), I use redirection links to analyze traffic sources. When a visitor clicks on these links, the following technical data is automatically collected before redirection:
landingPagePoints: Date and time of the click
privacyModal.landingPagePurpose: Purpose: This data is used for purely statistical purposes to measure the effectiveness of my professional communications and is not cross-referenced with other personal data.
privacyModal.dataUsageText: Your personal data is never shared, sold, or rented to third parties. It is used exclusively for the purposes described above.
privacyModal.retentionText: Data from the contact form and the AI assistant is kept for a period not exceeding what is necessary for the purposes for which it is processed, generally for a maximum of 3 years after our last contact.
privacyModal.yourRightsText: In accordance with the GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, and delete your data. To exercise these rights, you can contact me directly at arnaudmartiny0@gmail.com.
